Text:
Why the heck would you include romanian subs?
If including subs, always tell in description unless they are in english.
Great quality, but a minus for the subs (not that I am going to rate -1 because of it, I mean just a minus that you did).

Oh, and I just noticed...
Why the hell is episode 9 (haven't looked at 10 and 11 yet) with hardcoded french subs?
This is the kind of thing that a real "trusted" member would either describe in the info or never post at all!
Definatly a -1 this time!
